KSHMR Announced to Headline Quebec's ‘Unity Electro Fest'

Posted by Brittany Prevost on May 6, 2022

TICKETS

Time and time again, world renowned DJs from across the globe have stated Montreal is the bass capital of the world. If you've ever attended a show in Quebec, you may share in this sentiment. There's something truly special about the undeniable passion for dance music habitants of the province possess. It's made evident when one feels that contagious energy/love at events.

Despite the already notable dance music presence in the territory, there are several individuals who strive to expand its existence that much further. Among the lengthy list of people is Samuel Gourde and Maxime Nteziyaremye. The likeminded music enthusiasts are now part of a team who launched a brand-new EDM festival in Quebec!

Some of you may have already caught wind of the festival christened Unity Electro Fest back in 2020. Unfortunately, the pandemic had others plans, and the first edition was postponed. Fast forward to today, and the organizers are thrilled to launch its debut this coming August 13, 2022, at the ExpoCité, in Québec, QC.

Gourde, the General Manager of Unity Electro Fest, recently elaborated on the overall vision and official programming. He shared, "the goal is to finally set up a platform for local EDM artists in addition to offering Quebec City a showcase that reflects its reputation with its own electronic music festival."

His colleague, Nteziyaremye, the promotional and marketing director, added, "our team has been organizing several events for many years and we had a strong demand from our customers for a larger event! We have been working on this project for 3 years, so the whole structure of the festival is ready. [...]"

As you can tell, a lot of passion and hard work has already been put into the festival's planning. We have no doubts the first edition will be anything short of spectacular. To make matters even more exciting, the organizers recently revealed the event's first headliner. Get ready for a soon-to-be epic performance by KSHMR!

Pre-sale officially went on sale last week. Be sure to get your tickets ASAP. No, seriously, Flag fam - don't wait too long before securing your spot. There's approximately 15,000 anticipated attendees eager to experience everything the new festival has to offer. Keep it locked to Unity Electro Fest's socials for more details!

Written By Brittany Prevost
